channel.title: Posts on INSTEAD
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on INSTEAD

item.title: INSTEAD 3.2.2
item.author: gl00my@mail.ru (Peter Kosyh)
item.description: INSTEAD 3.2.2 is out! Changes are: new: mobile theme; new: -lang parameter; new: -notheme parameter; new: instead.screen_size(); enh: themes cleanups; new: cmake and LuaJIT build (-DWITH_LUAJIT=1); enh: autosave in emscripten build; enh: load status in emscripten build; new: machine-translated English manual; fix: Lua5.

item.title: INSTEAD3 new website
